scripts.dev:watch: NODE_ENV=development parcel build ../src/index.html --dist-dir ./dev --no-cache && NODE_ENV=development webpack watch --mode=development
scripts.build:test: npm run build:client && npm run build:app && electron-builder build --mac --dir && rm -r pre_build
scripts.build:only: npm run pre_build && electron-builder build --mac --win --publish never && rm -r pre_build
scripts.deploy: npm run pre_build && electron-builder build --mac --win --publish always && rm -r pre_build
scripts.increment-version: versiony package.json --patch && git add . && git commit -m 'new version' && git push
scripts.save:api: cd ../api && git add . && git commit -m 'save state' && git push
scripts.save:app: git add . && git commit -m 'save state' && git push
scripts.save:src: cd ../src && git add . && git commit -m 'save state' && git push
scripts.save:web: cd ../web && git add . && git commit -m 'save state' && git push
scripts.save: npm run save:api & npm run save:app & npm run save:src & npm run save:web
